entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
